title: I want to become a singer but I don't know how to create my own song and I can't do that. What should I do to become singer? - Quora

response.answer_text: I just created my own song on mayk.it, it was built by former TikTok and YouTube execs. Basically, you request an original song, give them all the details, and they send it to you. You choose the genre, give them lyrics (or they can have songwriters write some for you), and even record your voice so you can be the singer. It was easy and now I can say I’m a singer haha (well I have an original song to play to my friends and at parties, etc.)

Not everyone has the talent of writing their own songs so you can try for reality shows and make proper use so social media where you can get support and appreciation , upload covers on social media eventually you'll make your dream come true .but that takes a lot of time so be patient and try your best.
